name: Goomba's Easter Egg Hunt
summary: Goomba's Easter Egg Hunt is the second in Kaze Emanuar's line of Easter themed hacks of Super Mario 64. In this game you play as an actual Goomba, in order to fulfill his quest to hunt eggs hidden around few areas. Unlike in Thwomp's Easter Egg Hunt, there are no star descriptions in this mini-hack, and it employs a non-stop system, which means Goomba does not get kicked out of a level after getting an Easter Egg.
